Package client.graphics

Provides the classes necessary to render all graphics and play back audio files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectMsgAlertBox
    This class makes an AlertBox for the DM-function.
    GameNode
    This class starts and displays the window, where the game and the chat interactions take place.
    LobbyAlertBox
    This class makes an AlertBox for the join-lobby-function.
    PlayerEntity
    This class holds information related to graphical representation of a player.
    RenderedTile
    This class represents a tile (a positionX-positionY position) on the playing field.
    Textures
    This class loads textures necessary to render images onto the tiles.
    Vector
    This class provides vectors, which are a core game component.
